summary: [B3] Hwasan Crash in com.google.android.GoogleCamera tagged_addr_ctrl: 0000000000000001 signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -6 (SI_TKILL), fault addr -------- Abort message: '==12369==ERROR: HWAddressSanitizer: tag-mismatch on address 0x004d2831dc00 at pc 0x0077e1f21b48 READ of size 32 at 0x004d2831dc00 tags: 4d/1b (ptr/mem) in thread T68
details: In TBD of TBD, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
